Name: Chocolate Puff
Ingredients: 30 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
30 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Crumble a piece of Cadbury's Flake over the cocktail.
Review: Smooth as you like. The orange is surprisingly evident.
History: Created in 2002 by Wayne Collins for Maxxium UK.
